title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 275.10 - Contents of petition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 275.10 - Contents of petition

State Regulations

The petition shall contain a clear and concise statement of
the petitioner's claim showing that the petitioner is entitled to relief, and
shall further contain a demand for the relief to which the petitioner deems
himself/herself entitled. Such statement must be sufficiently clear to advise
the respondent of the nature of petitioner's claim and of the specific act or
acts complained of. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
275.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
